title: PAC Welcome Back BBQ
description: Join us for our annual Welcome Back BBQ! Meet other parents, learn about PAC initiatives for the year, and enjoy some great food. All families are welcome.

title: Monthly PAC Meeting
description: Regular monthly PAC meeting. Agenda includes budget review, upcoming fundraiser planning, and guest speaker from the school district on new curriculum updates.

title: Spring Fundraiser Gala
description: Our biggest fundraising event of the year! Silent auction, dinner, and entertainment. Tickets available through the school office. All proceeds go to playground renovation.
